member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel
member.summary: Specifies an input channel (e.g. Analog Channel 2).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel.None
member.summary: No channel specified.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel.Analog1
member.summary: Analog Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel.Analog2
member.summary: Analog Channel 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel.Rc1
member.summary: RC Channel 1

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel.Rc2
member.summary: RC Channel 2

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelType
member.summary: Specifies a channel type: RC or Analog.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelType.RC
member.summary: RC: this channel measures the width of pulses received.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelType.Analog
member.summary: Analog: this channel measures voltage.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse
member.summary: Specifies a channel use, including all Alternate uses (limit switches) and primary uses (controlling the motor speed).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.None
member.summary: None: This channel is not used for anything special but its value can be read using Serial or USB commands.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.LimitForward
member.summary: Forward Limit Switch: if this channel is active (Scaled Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move forward.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.LimitReverse
member.summary: Reverse Limit Switch: if this channel is active (Scaled Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move in reverse.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.KillSwitch
member.summary: Kill Switch: if this channel is active (Scale Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.Throttle
member.summary: Throttle: this channel is the motor throttle (reverse/forward) channel. Its Scaled Value is used to determine the motor's Target Speed.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUse.Steering
member.summary: Throttle: this channel is the motor steering (left/right) channel. Its Scaled Value is used to determine the motor's Target Speed.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil
member.summary: This static class contains extension methods that deal with identifying channels and figuring out what they are used for in the current settings.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.name(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Returns a user friendly name for the channel (e.g. "Analog Channel 1").

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.shortName(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Returns a short user friendly name for the channel (e.g. "Analog 1").

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.type(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Returns the type of the channel: RC or Analog.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.rawValueToStandardUnitsString(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts the Raw Value (or Unlimited Raw Value) of a channel in to a user friendly string that expresses the value in standard units. For example: "1501 us" or "1452 mV". It uses a non-ascii character to encode the Greek letter mu in microseconds.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.getChannel(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Gets the state of the specified channel.
member.param: The state of the device.
Specifies what channel to fetch.
member.returns: The state of the specified channel.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.getChannelSettings(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Gets the settings for the specified channel.
member.param: The settings of the device.
Specifies what channel to fetch.
member.returns: The settings of the specified channel.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.setChannelSettings(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings)
member.summary: Changes the settings for a specified channel.
member.param: The settings of the device. This object will be modified.
Specifies the channel to change.
The new settings for the channel.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.controlsMotorSpeed(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified channel is directly used to control the motor speed (i.e. it is a Throttle or Steering input).
member.param: Specifies the channel.
The input mode of the device (Serial/USB, Analog, RC).
The mixing mode of the device (None, Left, Right).
member.returns: True if and only if the channel controls the motor speed.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.use(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse)
member.summary: Determines what the specified channel is used for (e.g. limit switch or controlling the motor speed).
member.param: Specifies the channel.
The input mode of the device (Serial/USB, Analog, RC).
The mixing mode of the device (None, Left, Right).
The alternate use setting for the channel.
member.returns: What the channel is used for.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelUtil.switchActive(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified channel is a limit or kill switch and it is currently active. This information comes from the limitStatus register.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcRequest
member.summary: These are the values to put in to bRequest when making a setup packet for a control transfer to the Smc. See the comments and code in Smc.cs for more information about what these requests do and the format of the setup packet.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct
member.summary: Represents limits on the motor's behavior.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct.maxSpeed
member.summary: Max Speed is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies the maximum speed at which the motor controller will ever drive the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct.maxAcceleration
member.summary: Max Acceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to increase every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct.maxDeceleration
member.summary: Max Deceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to decrease every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct.brakeDuration
member.summary: Brake duration is the time, in milliseconds, that the motor controller will spend braking the motor (Current Speed = 0) before allowing the Current Speed to change signs.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimitsStruct.startingSpeed
member.summary: Minimum non-zero speed (1-3200). In RC or Analog mode, a scaled value of 1 maps to this speed. 0 means no effect.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.invert
member.summary: Used to invert the direction of scaling. If true, then a higher rawValue corresponds to lower scaledValue.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.scalingDegree
member.summary: 0 = Linear, 1 = Quadratic, 2 = Cubic, etc.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.alternateUse
member.summary: This is used to allow a channel be a limit switch if it is not controlling the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.pinMode
member.summary: Determines if the analog input is floating, pulled up, or pulled down. Does not apply to RC channels.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.errorMin
member.summary: rawValues greater than this generate an error.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.errorMax
member.summary: rawValues less than this generate an error.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.inputMin
member.summary: rawValues greater than or equal to this get mapped to a speed of -reverseLimits.maxSpeed (or forwardLimits.maxSpeed if invert==true).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.inputMax
member.summary: rawValues less than or equal to this get mapped to a speed of forwardLimits.maxSpeed (or -reverseLimits.maxSpeed if invert==true).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.inputNeutralMin
member.summary: rawValues between inputNeutralMin and inputNeutralMax get mapped to a speed of zero.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettingsStruct.inputNeutralMax
member.summary: rawValues between inputNeutralMin and inputNeutralMax get mapped to a speed of zero.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.neverSuspend
member.summary: If true, then never enter USB suspend mode.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.uartResponseDelay
member.summary: If true, then insert a one-byte delay before sending serial responses. This allows slower processors time to get ready to receive the response.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.useFixedBaudRate
member.summary: If true, then don't auto-detect the baud rate and instead use a fixed baud rate, specified by fixedBaudRateRegister.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.disableSafeStart
member.summary: When false, puts strct requirements on what is necessary to start the motor. See the user's guide for for more information.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.fixedBaudRateRegister
member.summary: The value to put in to the device's baud rate register to generate the fixed baud rate. Only relevant if useFixedBaudRate is true.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.speedUpdatePeriod
member.summary: Time between accel/decel updates to the speed. Units of 1 ms. Should never be 0!

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.commandTimeout
member.summary: The time before a command timeout error occurs, in units of 10 ms. A value of 0 disables the command timeout feature.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.serialDeviceNumber
member.summary: The serial device number used to address this device in the Pololu protocol.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.crcMode
member.summary: Whether CRC is disabled, required for reception, or required for reception and sent during transmission.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.overTempMin
member.summary: See tempLimitGradual. Units: tenths of a degree Celsius.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.overTempMax
member.summary: The temperature where speed is limited to 0. Units: tenths of a degree Celsius.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.pwmPeriodFactor
member.summary: Determines the PWM frequency (0-19, 0=highest freq).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.minPulsePeriod
member.summary: Minimum allowed time between consecutive RC pulse rising edges. Units: 1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.maxPulsePeriod
member.summary: Maximum allowed time between consecutive RC pulse rising edges. If this amount of time elapses and no pulses at all have been received, then the motor is shut down and an error is generated. Units: 1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.rcTimeout
member.summary: Generates error and shuts down the motor if we go this long without heeding a pulse (units of 1 ms).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.ignorePotDisconnect
member.summary: If false, check for pot disconnect by toggling the pot power pins.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.tempLimitGradual
member.summary: False: abrupt limit past overTempMax asserted until temp falls below overTempMin. True: gradual speed limit starting at overTempMin.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.consecGoodPulses
member.summary: Number of previously received consecutive good pulses needed to heed the latest pulse received and update the channel's rawValue. 0 means no previous good pulses are required, so we update the channel's value on every good pulse.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.motorInvert
member.summary: Invert Motor Direction. Boolean that specifies the correspondence between speed (-3200 to 3200) and voltages on OUTA/OUTB. Normally, a speed of 3200 means OUTA~VIN, OUTB=0. If motorInvert is true, then a speed of 3200 means OUTA=0, OUTB~VIN.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.speedZeroBrakeAmount
member.summary: Brake amount while input is in deadband (0-32), or there is an error, or motor is driving at speed zero.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.ignoreErrLineHigh
member.summary: If false, stop the motor if the ERR line is high (allows you to connect the error lines of two devices and have them both stop when one has an error).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.lowVinShutoffTimeout
member.summary: VIN must stay below lowVinShutoffMv for this duration before a low-VIN error occurs (units of 1 ms).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.lowVinShutoffMv
member.summary: Dropping below this voltage threshold for a duration of lowVinShutoffTimeout triggers a low-voltage error (units of mV). Dropping below this voltage threshold triggers a low-voltage error (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.lowVinStartupMv
member.summary: Once asserting a low-voltage error, the voltage required to stop asserting this error (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.highVinShutoffMv
member.summary: Rising above this voltage threshold triggers a high-voltage error and causes the motor to immediately brake at 100% (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettingsStruct.serialMode
member.summary: Determines what types of commands are accepted and whether to echo incoming bytes.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelVariables
member.summary: Represents the current state of an input channel.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelVariables.unlimitedRawValue
member.summary: The raw value of the channel as read from the pin. This is mainly useful for the control input setup wizard. 0xFFFF if disconnected but not affected by absolute max/min limits. Units of quarter-microseconds if an RC channel. 12-bit ADC reading (0-4095) if analog. 0xFFFF if input is disconnected.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelVariables.rawValue
member.summary: This is just like unlimitedRawValue except that it will be 0xFFFF if the absolute max/min limits are violated.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelVariables.scaledValue
member.summary: The result of scaling the rawValue. This value depends on all the scaling settings in the channel's SmcChannelSettings struct.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables
member.summary: Represents the current state of the device, including all input channels and motor limits.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.errorStatus
member.summary: The errors that are currently happening.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.errorOccurred
member.summary: The errors that occurred since the last time this register was cleared.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.serialErrorOccurred
member.summary: The serial errors that occurred since the last time this register was cleared.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.limitStatus
member.summary: Status bits for anything that is limiting the motor speed that isn't an error (but it could be caused by an error, such as StartedState).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.rc1
member.summary: The current state of RC Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.rc2
member.summary: The current state of RC Channel 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.analog1
member.summary: The current state of Analog Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.analog2
member.summary: The current state of Analog Channel 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.targetSpeed
member.summary: Target speed of motor from -3200 to 3200.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.speed
member.summary: Current speed of motor from -3200 to 3200. Can be non-zero even if power is off.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.brakeAmount
member.summary: Current braking amount, from 0 to 32. This value is only relevant when speed==0, otherwise it will be 0xFF.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.vinMv
member.summary: The voltage on the VIN line in units of millivolts.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.temperature
member.summary: The reading from the temperature sensor, in units of one tenth of a degree Celsius. Temperatures below 0 degrees are reported as 0.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.rcPeriod
member.summary: The measured period of the RC pulses, in units of 0.1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.baudRateRegister
member.summary: Value from the device's baud-rate register.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.timeMs
member.summary: The time that the device has been running. Units: 1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.forwardLimits
member.summary: The currently-used motor limits for the forward direction. By default, these are equal to the hard limits in SmcSettingsStruct, but they can be temporarily changed by USB or Serial commands.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcVariables.reverseLimits
member.summary: The currently-used motor limits for the reverse direction. By default, these are equal to the hard limits in SmcSettingsStruct, but they can be temporarily changed by USB or Serial commands.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode
member.summary: The Input Mode setting for the device. This specifies how the motor speed is determined.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode.SerialUsb
member.summary: Motor speed is set via serial and USB commands.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode.Analog
member.summary: The voltage on A1/A2 determines the motor speed.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcInputMode.RC
member.summary: The width of pulses received on RC1 and RC2 determines the motor speed.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode
member.summary: The Mixing Mode setting for the device. This specifies which channels are used in calculating the motor speed and how the calculation is to be done. The Mixing Mode only applies if the Input Mode is Analog or RC.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode.None
member.summary: The motor speed is determined entirely by RC/Analog Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode.Left
member.summary: The motor speed is determined by adding RC/Analog Channels 1 and 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMixingMode.Right
member.summary: The motor speed is determined by subtracting RC/Analog Channel 2 from Channel 1.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialMode
member.summary: Specifies what kinds of serial commands will be accepted.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialMode.Binary
member.summary: Commands and responses support the Pololu, Compact, or Mini SSC binary protocols, specified in the user's guide.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialMode.Ascii
member.summary: Commands and responses obey the ASCII command protocol, specified in the user's guide.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcCrcMode
member.summary: Specifies how Cyclic Redundancy Checks (CRC) will be used in serial communication.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcCrcMode.Disabled
member.summary: In this mode, CRC will not be used.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcCrcMode.Commands
member.summary: In this mode, you must append a CRC byte to all commands sent to the device.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcCrcMode.CommandsAndResponses
member.summary: In this mode, you must append a CRC byte to all commands sent to the device, and responses from the device will contain a CRC byte.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcDirection
member.summary: Specifies a motor direction: Forward, Reverse or Brake (for variable braking).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcDirection.Forward
member.summary: Forward.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcDirection.Reverse
member.summary: Reverse (opposite of Forward).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcDirection.Brake
member.summary: Brake. Used for variable braking commands.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse
member.summary: Specifies the alternate use setting for a channel. This setting is only relevant if the channel is not configured to control the motor speed (see SmcInputMode and SmcMixingMode).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse.None
member.summary: None: This channel is not used for anything special but its value can be read using Serial or USB commands.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse.LimitForward
member.summary: Forward Limit Switch: if this channel is active (Scaled Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move forward.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse.LimitReverse
member.summary: Reverse Limit Switch: if this channel is active (Scaled Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move in reverse.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelAlternateUse.KillSwitch
member.summary: Kill Switch: if this channel is active (Scale Value >= 1600), then the motor is not allowed to move.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPinMode
member.summary: Specifies the pin mode for an Analog input channel. This setting is not relevant for RC input cahnnels.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPinMode.Floating
member.summary: Floating: no pull-up or pull-down resistors enabled.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPinMode.PullUp
member.summary: Weak pull-up resistor (to 3.3 V) enabled.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPinMode.PullDown
member.summary: Weak pull-down resistor (to 0 V) enabled.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus
member.summary: Defines the bits in the LimitStatus register, which tells us what things are currently limiting the motor speed.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.StartedState
member.summary: Motor is not allowed to run due to an error or safe-start violation.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Temperature
member.summary: Temperature is actively reducing Target Speed.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.MaxSpeed
member.summary: Max speed limit is actively reducing Target Speed. Only happens when Input Mode is Serial/USB.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.StartingSpeed
member.summary: Starting speed limit is actively reducing Target Speed to 0. Only happens when Input Mode is Serial/USB.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Acceleration
member.summary: Motor speed is not equal to target speed because of acceleration, deceleration, or brake duration limits.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Rc1
member.summary: RC Channel 1 is configured as a limit/kill switch and it is active (Scaled Value >= 1600).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Rc2
member.summary: RC Channel 2 is configured as a limit/kill switch and it is active (Scaled Value >= 1600).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Analog1
member.summary: Analog Channel 1 is configured as a limit/kill switch and it is active (Scaled Value >= 1600).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.Analog2
member.summary: Analog Channel 2 is configured as a limit/kill switch and it is active (Scaled Value >= 1600).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcLimitStatus.UsbKill
member.summary: USB kill switch is active.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPwmMode
member.summary: The PWM mode to use. This feature is not exposed to users because we found the DriveBrake mode to be much better than DriveCode mode.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPwmMode.DriveBrake
member.summary: PWM between driving and braking (both low-side MOSFETs on).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcPwmMode.DriveCoast
member.summary: PWM between driving and coasting.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError
member.summary: Defines the different errors that the device has.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.SafeStart
member.summary: See http://www.pololu.com/docs/0J44

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.ChannelInvalid
member.summary: This error occurs whenever any required RC or Analog channel is invalid.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.Serial
member.summary: This error occurs whenever the Input Mode is Serial/USB and something goes wrong with the serial communication, either on the RX/TX lines or on the USB virtual COM port.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.CommandTimeout
member.summary: This error occurs if Input Mode is Serial/USB and the (configurable) time period has elapsed with no valid serial or USB commands being received by the controller. See commandTimeout in SmcSettings.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.LimitSwitch
member.summary: This error occurs when a limit or kill switch channel stops the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.VinLow
member.summary: This error occurs whenever your power supply's voltage is too low or it is disconnected.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.VinHigh
member.summary: This error occurs whenever your power supply's voltage is too high.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.TemperatureHigh
member.summary: This error occurs whenever the reading from the temperature sensor is too high.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.MotorDriverError
member.summary: This error occurs whenever the motor driver chip reports an under-voltage or over-temperature error (by driving its fault line low).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcError.ErrLineHigh
member.summary: This error occurs whenever there are no other errors but the voltage on the ERR line is high (2.3-5 V).

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError
member.summary: Defines the different serial errors that are recorded.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.None
member.summary: None.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.Parity
member.summary: This is not used.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.Frame
member.summary: This is error occurs when a de-synchronization or excessive noise on the RX line is detected.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.Noise
member.summary: This error occurs when noise is detected on the RX line.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.RxOverrun
member.summary: This error occurs when the buffer for storing bytes received on the RX line is full and data was lost as a result.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.Format
member.summary: This error occurs if the serial bytes received on RX or the virtual COM port do not obey the protocol specified in this guide.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSerialError.Crc
member.summary: This error occurs if you have enabled cyclic redundancy check (CRC) for serial commands, but the CRC byte received was invalid.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit
member.summary: Specifies what motor limits to set. You can use the OR (|) operator to apply the ForwardOnly or ReverseOnly modifiers to MaxSpeed, MaxAcceleration, MaxDeceleration, or BrakeDuration. Without any modifies, this value specifies woth the forward and reverse limits.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.MaxSpeed
member.summary: Max Speed is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies the maximum speed at which the motor controller will ever drive the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.MaxAcceleration
member.summary: Max Acceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to increase every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.MaxDeceleration
member.summary: Max Deceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to decrease every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.BrakeDuration
member.summary: Brake duration is the time, in milliseconds, that the motor controller will spend braking the motor (Current Speed = 0) before allowing the Current Speed to change signs.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.ForwardOnly
member.summary: A modifier that specifies that only the forward limit should be set.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit.ReverseOnly
member.summary: A modified that specifies that only the reverse limit should be set.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSetMotorLimitProblem
member.summary: Specifies the return code from a Set Motor Limit command.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSetMotorLimitProblem.None
member.summary: There were no problems with the set motor limit command.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSetMotorLimitProblem.ForwardConflict
member.summary: The value you were trying to set was more dangerous than the hard limit for the Forward direction, so the hard limit was used instead. This may be the desired behavior.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSetMotorLimitProblem.ReverseConflict
member.summary: The value you were trying to set was more dangerous than the hard limit for the Reverse direction, so the hard limit was used instead. This may be the desired behavior.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcResetFlags
member.summary: Specifies the causes of the device's last reset.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcResetFlags.ResetPin
member.summary: The device was reset because the voltage on the Reset pin went low.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcResetFlags.Power
member.summary: The device was reset because power was turned off/on.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcResetFlags.Software
member.summary: The device was reset by software running on the device. This happens at the end of a firmware upgrade when the bootloader starts the new firmware.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcResetFlags.Watchdog
member.summary: The device was reset by the watchdog timer. This indicates a problem with the firmware which should be reported to Pololu.com.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings
member.summary: Specifies the settings to use for a particular Input Channel.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.alternateUse
member.summary: This is used to allow a channel be a limit switch if it is not controlling the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.invert
member.summary: Used to invert the direction of scaling. If true, then a higher rawValue corresponds to lower scaledValue.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.scalingDegree
member.summary: 0 = Linear, 1 = Quadratic, 2 = Cubic, etc.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.pinMode
member.summary: Determines if the analog input is floating, pulled up, or pulled down. Does not apply to RC channels.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.errorMin
member.summary: rawValues greater than this generate an error.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.errorMax
member.summary: rawValues less than this generate an error.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.inputMin
member.summary: rawValues greater than or equal to this get mapped to a speed of -reverseLimits.maxSpeed (or forwardLimits.maxSpeed if invert==true).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.inputMax
member.summary: rawValues less than or equal to this get mapped to a speed of forwardLimits.maxSpeed (or -reverseLimits.maxSpeed if invert==true).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.inputNeutralMin
member.summary: rawValues between inputNeutralMin and inputNeutralMax get mapped to a speed of zero.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.inputNeutralMax
member.summary: rawValues between inputNeutralMin and inputNeutralMax get mapped to a speed of zero.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.defaultRCSettings
member.summary: Returns the default settings for RC channels.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.defaultAnalogSettings
member.summary: Returns the default settings for Analog channels.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.defaults(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannel)
member.summary: Returns the default settings for the given channel.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates an independent copy of this object.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this object to another and sees if they have the same values.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcChannelSettings.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits
member.summary: Specifies motor limits for a particular direction.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.maxSpeed
member.summary: Max Speed is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies the maximum speed at which the motor controller will ever drive the motor.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.maxAcceleration
member.summary: Max Acceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to increase every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.maxDeceleration
member.summary: Max Deceleration is a number between 0 and 3200 that specifies how much the magnitude (absolute value) of the motor speed is allowed to decrease every speed update period. 0 means no limit.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.brakeDuration
member.summary: Brake duration is the time, in milliseconds, that the motor controller will spend braking the motor (Current Speed = 0) before allowing the Current Speed to change signs.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.startingSpeed
member.summary: Minimum non-zero speed (1-3200). In RC or Analog mode, a scaled value of 1 maps to this speed. 0 means no effect.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.Clone
member.summary: Creates an independent copy of this object.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this object to another to see if they have the same values.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimits.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code of this instance.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings
member.summary: This class represents all the settings for a Simple Motor Controller, including the channel settings and hard motor limits.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.neverSuspend
member.summary: If true, then never enter USB suspend mode.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.uartResponseDelay
member.summary: If true, then insert a one-byte delay before sending serial responses. This allows slower processors time to get ready to receive the response.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.useFixedBaudRate
member.summary: If true, then don't auto-detect the baud rate and instead use a fixed baud rate, specified by fixedBaudRateBps.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.disableSafeStart
member.summary: When false, puts strct requirements on what is necessary to start the motor. See the user's guide for for more information.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.fixedBaudRateBps
member.summary: The value to put in to the device's baud rate register to generate the fixed baud rate. Only relevant if useFixedBaudRate is true.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.speedUpdatePeriod
member.summary: Time between accel/decel updates to the speed. Units of 1 ms. Should never be 0!

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.commandTimeout
member.summary: The time before a command timeout error occurs, in units of 10 ms. A value of 0 disables the command timeout feature.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.serialDeviceNumber
member.summary: The serial device number used to address this device in the Pololu protocol.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.crcMode
member.summary: Whether CRC is disabled, required for reception, or required for reception and sent during transmission.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.overTempMin
member.summary: See tempLimitGradual. Units: tenths of a degree Celsius.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.overTempMax
member.summary: The temperature where speed is limited to 0. Units: tenths of a degree Celsius.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.inputMode
member.summary: Input mode: Serial, RC, or Analog.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.pwmMode
member.summary: PWM Mode: Drive/Brake or Drive/Coast. The drive/coast mode is a lot worse than drive/brake mode so we don't actually let the user use this setting.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.pwmPeriodFactor
member.summary: Determines the PWM frequency (0-19, 0=highest freq).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.mixingMode
member.summary: Mixing Mode: None, Left, or Right

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.minPulsePeriod
member.summary: Minimum allowed time between consecutive RC pulse rising edges. Units: 1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.maxPulsePeriod
member.summary: Maximum allowed time between consecutive RC pulse rising edges. If this amount of time elapses and no pulses at all have been received, then the motor is shut down and an error is generated. Units: 1 ms.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.rcTimeout
member.summary: Generates error and shuts down motor if we go this long without heeding a pulse (units of 1 ms).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.ignorePotDisconnect
member.summary: If false, check for pot disconnects by toggling the pot power pins.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.tempLimitGradual
member.summary: False: abrupt limit past overTempMax asserted until temp falls below overTempMin. True: gradual speed limit starting at overTempMin.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.consecGoodPulses
member.summary: Number of previously received consecutive good pulses needed to heed the latest pulse received and update the channel's raw value. 0 means no previous good pulses are required, so we update the channel's value on every good pulse.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.motorInvert
member.summary: Invert Motor Direction. Boolean that specifies the correspondence between speed (-3200 to 3200) and voltages on OUTA/OUTB. Normally, a speed of 3200 means OUTA~VIN, OUTB=0. If motorInvert is true, then a speed of 3200 means OUTA=0, OUTB~VIN.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.speedZeroBrakeAmount
member.summary: Brake amount while input is in deadband (0-32), or there is an error, or motor is driving at speed zero.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.ignoreErrLineHigh
member.summary: Stop the motor if the ERR line is high (allows you to connect the error lines of two devices and have them both stop when one has an error).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.vinMultiplierOffset
member.summary: The VIN multiplier offset is a calibration factor used in computing VIN. The default value of 0 should work fine for most purposes.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.lowVinShutoffTimeout
member.summary: VIN must stay below lowVinShutoffMv for this duration before a low-VIN error occurs (units of 1 ms).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.lowVinShutoffMv
member.summary: Dropping below this voltage threshold triggers a low-voltage error (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.lowVinStartupMv
member.summary: Once asserting a low-voltage error, the voltage required to stop asserting this error (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.highVinShutoffMv
member.summary: Rising above this voltage threshold triggers a high-voltage error and causes the motor to immediately brake at 100% (units of mV).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.serialMode
member.summary: Determines what types of commands are accepted and whether to echo incoming bytes.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.rc1
member.summary: Settings for RC Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.rc2
member.summary: Settings for RC Channel 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.analog1
member.summary: Settings for Analog Channel 1.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.analog2
member.summary: Settings for Analog Channel 2.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.forwardLimits
member.summary: Hard motor limits in the forward direction.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.reverseLimits
member.summary: Hard motor limits in the reverse direction.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.#ctor(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Constructs a new SmcSettings object that has the default settings for a particular product.
member.param: The product ID of the device. This determines the initial value of some product-dependent parameters like highVinShutoffMv. Pass this argument as 0 if the product ID is unknown at this time.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates an independent copy of this object.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this object to another to see if they have the same values.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile
member.summary: A static class with methods for reading and writing configuration files.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.complexTags
member.summary: XML tags that are expected to have children.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.load(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.UInt16)
member.summary: Parses a saved configuration file and returns a SmcSettings object.
member.param: A list of warnings. Whenever something goes wrong with the file loading, a warning will be added to this list. The warnings are not fatal; if the function returns it will return a valid SmcSettings object.
The file to read from.
The product id of the device we are loading these settings for. Pass 0 if it is unknown at this time.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.load(System.IO.StreamReader,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.UInt16)
member.summary: Parses a saved configuration file and returns a SmcSettings object.
member.param: A list of warnings. Whenever something goes wrong with the file loading, a warning will be added to this list. The warnings are not fatal; if the function returns it will return a valid SmcSettings object.
The file to read from.
The product id of the device we are loading these settings for. Pass 0 if it is unknown at this time.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.WriteElementBool(System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an element that holds a boolean value. For example: "true".

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.WriteElementRange(System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Adds an element that represents a range. For example: ''

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.save(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings,System.String,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc)
member.summary: Writes a SmcSettings object as text to the specified streamwriter.
member.param: The settings to read from.
The file to write to.
The device that these settings came from (optional!). Adds extra comments to the file.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SettingsFile.save(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings,System.IO.StreamWriter,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc)
member.summary: Writes a SmcSettings object as text to the specified streamwriter.
member.param: The settings to read from.
The file to write to.
The device that these settings came from (optional!). Adds extra comments to the file.

member.name: T:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc
member.summary: This variable represents a native USB connection to a Simple Motor Controller. It contains functions taht allow you to easily send any of the native USB commands that the device supports.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.deviceInterfaceGuid
member.summary: This is the GUID used in Windows to identify the native USB interfaces of all of the Simple Motor Controllers. It comes from smc.inf.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.vendorID
member.summary: This is the USB Vendor ID (Pololu Corporation).

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.productIDs
member.summary: These are the USB product IDs of the Simple Motor Controllers.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.bootloaderProductIDs
member.summary: These are the USB product IDs for the bootloaders of the Simple Motor Controllers.

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.channels
member.summary: The channels that are available on this device.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setDeviceListItemText(Pololu.UsbWrapper.DeviceListItem)
member.summary: This function defines how we will display lists of these devices/bootloaders, both in SmcCmd and in the Simple Motor Control Center and in the Firmware Upgrade form.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.productIdToShortModelString(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Coverts a USB product ID to a short string describing the device, e.g. "18v15" or "18v15 bootloader".

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.productIdToLongModelString(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts a USB product ID to the official, long string describing the device, e.g. "Pololu Simple High-Power Motor Controller 18v15".

member.name: F:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.productId
member.summary: The USB product ID of the particul device that we are connected to.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.#ctor(Pololu.UsbWrapper.DeviceListItem)
member.summary: Opens (connects to) the selected device, constructing an object that we can use to communicate with the device over its native USB interface.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getConnectedDevices
member.summary: Gets a list of devices that are currently connected to USB.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getConnectedBootloaders
member.summary: Gets a list of bootloaders that are currently connected to USB.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getFirmwareVersionMinor
member.summary: Gets the minor version number of the firmware (the number after the decimal point).

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getFirmwareVersionMajor
member.summary: Gets the major version number of the firmware (the number before the decimal point).

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getFirmwareVersionString
member.summary: Returns a string representing the firmware version, like "1.00".

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.startBootloader
member.summary: Causes the device to disconnect and enter bootloader mode so you can upgrade its firmware. After calling this, you should call Dispose() and delete any references you have to this object because it will not be usable anymore.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.resetSettings
member.summary: Resets the device to its default, factory settings. This takes about 26 ms.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.fixSettings(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.UInt16)
member.summary: Fixes certain thigns about a setttings object so that it doesn't make the device do something invalid. For each thing that gets fixed, a warning is added to the warnings list that is passed in.
member.param: The settings to fix.
A list of warnings. This function will add items to the list.
The product ID of the device these settings will be used for. If unknown, this argument should be 0.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getSmcSettings
member.summary: Reads the current settings from the device.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setMotorLimit(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcMotorLimit,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Temporarily sets a motor limit. This change will last until the next time the device resets, or until another setMotorLimit command is issued which changes the limit. This function will not violate the hard motor limits that are stored in flash (with setSmcSettings).

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.exitSafeStart
member.summary: Clears the Safe Start Violation bit in the SmcVariables.errorStatus. This function has no effect unless the input mode of the device is SerialUsb.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setSmcSettings(Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcSettings)
member.summary: Sends a new set of settings to the device, to be written to flash. This takes about 26 ms.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getSmcVariables
member.summary: Gets the current state of the device.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getResetFlags
member.summary: Returns the cause of the device's last reset.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.getResetCause
member.summary: Returns the cause of the device's last reset. Provides the same information as getResetFlags, but in a human-friendly string instead of an enum.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.temperatureToString(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Creates a string for representing a temperature reading to the user. Warning: this string will contain non-ascii characters.
member.param: A temperature in units of tenths of a degree Celsius.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setUsbKill(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the state of the USB kill switch. True means activate the switch (stop the motor). False means deactive the switch (allow the motor to start). The state of the USB kill switch is available in the UsbKill bit of SmcVariables.limitStatus.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setSpeed(System.UInt16,Pololu.SimpleMotorController.SmcDirection)
member.summary: Sets the state of the motor. This only works if you are in Serial/USB input mode.
member.param: If direction is Forward or Reverse, speed is a number from 0 to 3200. If direction is Brake, speed is a number from 0 to 32.
The direction to drive the motor in: Forward, Reverse, or Brake.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setSpeed(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the state of the motor. This overload only lets you drive the motor in forward or reverse. For variable braking, use the other overload. This function only works if you are in Serial/USB input mode.
member.param: A number between -3200 and 3200, where -3200 to -1 is in reverse direction and 0 to 3200 is forward direction.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.stop
member.summary: Stops the motor. Has the same effect as the "Stop Motor" button in the control center. Equivalent to setUsbKill(true).

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.resume
member.summary: Allows the motor start. Has the same effect as the "Resume" button in the control center. Equivalent to setUsbKill(false) followed by exitSafeStart().

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.setBrake(System.Byte)
member.summary: Causes the motor to brake.
member.param: A number from 0 to 32 specifying the amount of braking. 0 is nearly-full coasting. 32 is full braking.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.convertBaudRegisterToBps(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts a baud rate from the value used in the baud rate register to bps.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.convertBpsToBaudRegister(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts a baud rate from bps to a value suitable to be used in the baud rate register.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.speedToPercentString(System.Int16)
member.summary: Converts a signed speed in to a percentage string (with a minus sign if needed).
member.param: A speed value from -3200 to 3200.

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.accelDecelToString(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts an acceleration or deceleration limit to a user-friendly string. 0 is shown as "N/A".

member.name: M:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.rcPeriodToString(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts an RC period from SmcVariables to a user-friendly string.

member.name: P:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.name
member.summary: The generic name of this type of device.

member.name: P:Pololu.SimpleMotorController.Smc.namePlural
member.summary: The plural generic name of this type of device.
